result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael J Golden was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine to be paid at a rate of $100.00 per month commencing 8/01/2015 (w/payment plan fee of $15.00) alternate 6 days.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael J Golden

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Michael J Golden in court with attorney Katie B. Bricco.  Timothy Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Prosecuting attorney moves to amend Ct. 1 to Theft contrary to section 13.102(c)(12)  of the Waukesha County Code of Ordinances.  Court approves amendment.  No contest plea entered.  Court finds defendant guilty. Ct. 2 dismissed and read-in. 

Court orders the following:
Ct. 1:
- Fine $267.50 to be paid at a rate of $100.00 per month commencing 08/01/2015; alternate 6 days jail
with attached witness list filed by the State.
Jury trial - 12 person on June 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Jury status hearing on June 25, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Michael J Golden in court with attorney Katie B. Bricco.  Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. Bricco has received discovery and requests a jury status/jury trial date. Court grants request.  Jury status hearing scheduled for June 25, 2015 at 11:00 am.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for June 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Authorization to appear received and filed.

Defendant Michael J Golden in court with attorney Katie B. Bricco.  Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense is requesting another date. Defense has not received discovery yet. Court will give a date in 3 weeks.  Hearing scheduled for May 20, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Michael J Golden in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant needs to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation or  Defendant to seek counsel. Court will put this matter over for 3 weeks.  Hearing scheduled for April 22, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Hearing on April 1, 2015 at 02:00 pm.  **no paper copy in physical file**

Defendant Michael J Golden in court.  Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation or Defendant to seek counsel. Court will give another date.  Hearing scheduled for April 1, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
No contact at Waukesha Memorial Hospital unless its for emergency.

Defendant Michael J Golden in court, in custody.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises of right to an attorney.   NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT. 
  Hearing scheduled for March 16, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
